info.title: IRI Facility Status API
info.description: This API implements the standard integrated research infrastructure specification for facility status.

get.summary: Get a collection of IRI resources.
get.description: Returns a list of IRI resources matching the query.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Provides media types that are acceptable for the response. At the moment application/json is the supported response encoding.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: The HTTP request may contain the If-Modified-Since header requesting all models with creationTime after the specified date. The date must be specified in RFC 1123 format.

parameters.description: The group parameter will filter resources based on group membership.  If group is specified then only resources that are a member of the specified group will be returned.
